title: What is this?!!?
body:
Basically I hopped into a ranked game unfinished and we were nearly at their inhibs then I get booted out of game to the main client and I was looking up on op.gg to see if my game was going and it was still going. 
https://gyazo.com/fd5f29a535f0ffb29d25b43e14398c33
https://gyazo.com/2eb2c55716c1d2b5e6eb8c902962cd34    <---- Screenshots to show proof
I don't know if I'm gonna lose some points or possibly get penalized for leaverbuster but if I do. I'm just gonna complain to riot and their support system for accusing me of "afking" even though I got booted 
out of the  

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NlukGdDikGU&t=9s

replies.body: If you were booted back to the main client without any options to reconnect, it's most likely that the game crashed on the server or if it was still early enough in the game it might have been /remade. You couldn't reconnect because the game didn't exist! Op.gg isn't a great resource to check for game data since their servers are completely different from ours. Also, in the rare event of these game crashes no one will receive any penalties for the match.
